trial_type.Description: Indicator of type of action that is expected

Levels.AX: Cue A Probe X. Target trial; correct response is button 2.
Levels.BX: non-A Cue, Probe X. High cognitive control demands.
Levels.BY: non-A Cue, non-X Probe. Low cognitive control demands.
Levels.Ang: Cue A, number Probe. No-go trial.
Levels.Bng: non-A Cue, number Probe. No-go trial.

response_time.Description: Time between appearance of Probe and button press (ProbeSlide.RT in eprime output).

response_button.Description: Whether the button under the first or second finger of the right hand was pressed.

response_accuracy.Description: If the trial response was correct. Note that no response (response_button n/a) is correct for no-go trials (Ang and Bng).
